sub_title: Techno-Commercial Leader || Executive Coach || Solar Program Manager at Shell || Mentor Women in Tech (views are my own)
summary:
I’m a Professional Certified Consciousness Coach (ACTP, ICF) to visionary executives and founders of the fastest growing technology companies who are building their legacy. With a unique blend of analytical problem solving and people-oriented acumen, I strongly believe in an integrated approach to respond to challenges. Also, I'm a Mentor with 10+ years of experience.

My passion lies in the new energies sector, in finding ways on how to bring key technology solutions to a broader market. Track records of successful delivery in a complex environment with multiple stakeholders - excellent interpersonal skills. PhD in Physics obtained at TU Delft - tech and strategic mindset.

I believe in making a beneficial impact on society and improving the quality of life. Value life-long learning and challenges. Passionate about people's development.

profile_positions.location: Renewables & Energy Solutions Europe, Den Haag, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
•	Drive the commercial shaping and sales of energy solutions (e.g. solar, battery storage, energy management) to Industrial and Commercial customers (I&C). 
•	Lead in the negotiation and creation of commercial agreements with customers, as well as the overall end-to-end commercial deal shaping and risk management.
•	Solid internal communication and alignment with the customer to enable smooth progression of opportunities from concept design through to Project Development Agreement/Heads of Terms, Solution Development and Contract close. 
•	Engage with technical, finance, contracting and procurement and legal internal functions to select the best technical and commercial solutions including their delivery partners to respond to the needs of Shell’s customers. 
•	Drive multiple opportunities forward simultaneously. Maintain a pipeline of opportunities and project progress, including accurate pipeline forecasts, account meetings, feedback on tenders and record of opportunity plans. Prepare associated investment proposals and other governance papers for internal approvals. 
•	Managed stakeholders within the Group to ensure practical deployment of projects, capture and share learnings of execution and monetization of opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Advisor B2B

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for managing Innovation services for Hollandse Kust Noord Offshore Windfarm for the five innovations (grid friendly turbines, windfarm control, floating solar, baseload power hub,
systems integration).
•	Delivered contractual setup (incl. IP) for each innovation (incl. negotiations with
industrial and academical parties).
•	Responsible for interphase management between WP’s, TECOP integration, budget
planning. Support tech leads in opportunities framing.
profile_positions.title: Innovation Services Lead Offshore Wind

profile_positions.location: H2 production and e-conversion, New Energies Research and Technology
profile_positions.description:
•	Establish and Lead Solar Program with more than 20 international projects in the portfolio, covering short and mid-term activities (time frame up to 7 years)
•	Project manager on multiple external technical collaborations with leading academic institutions, research centres, and industrial partners (incl. opportunity framing, negotiations, roadmap)
•	Manage knowledge integration into the company, identify cross-fertilization opportunities
•	Provide technical consultancy in electrolysis, power and heat projects
•	Represent the company at different consortia and conference meetings
•	Coach/mentor interns and graduates
profile_positions.title: Lead Solar Photovoltaics / Hydrogen

profile_positions.location: Long Range Research, Amsterdam Area, Netherlands
profile_positions.description:
•	Project manager on multiple external technical collaborations with leading academic institutions, and research centers with the focus on long-term strategic activities (D0)
•	Delivered multiple landscaping studies devoted to the emerging market technologies in Solar Photovoltaic and Electrolysis
•	Provided technical due diligence and consultancy for investment opportunities in the power and heat sector
profile_positions.title: Researcher Electrolysis / Solar

profile_positions.description:
I’m a Leadership Advisor to visionary executives and founders of the fastest growing technology companies who are building their legacy. With a unique blend of analytical problem solving and people-oriented acumen, I strongly believe in an integrated approach to respond to challenges. Coaching enables to build a new approach to life, not by making quick-fix temporary solutions, but rather in deepening of self-awareness. I create a trust-based and confidential environment, which supports to have an open conversation.

"We cannot solve our problems with the same thinking we used when we created them." Albert Einstein

https://www.tatianakozlova.com/
profile_positions.title: Certified Consciousness Coach (CCC, ACTP ICF)

profile_positions.description: Performed Transmission Electron Microscopy investigations and in-situ electrical measurements on metal nanobridges. Research process included micro- and nanofabrication, measurements as well as writing of articles and presenting the results to the scientific community at different international conferences, training support for bachelor and PhD students.
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral researcher & teaching assistant

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked with Transmission Electron Microscopy (TEM) using analytical techniques like Cs-corrected HREM, HAADF-STEM, EELS and EDX
•	Performed in-situ experiments with electrical and heating TEM holders, as well as with the combination of two dynamic conditions
•	Developed and produced microelectromechanical systems (MEMS) in a clean room using Electron Beam Lithography, Optical Lithography, dry & wet etching, metal films deposition, wet bench processing
•	Worked with Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM), Scanning Electron Microscopy (SEM), Optical Microscopy (OM), Ellipsometry, Four-Probe Station, Wire Bonder (WB), IVVI rack
•	Presented research in 2 invited talks, 8 scientific conferences with oral presentations, 4 journal publications, 1 filed patent and PhD dissertation
•	Taught TEM Research Practicum for 32 bachelor students (150 hours)
profile_positions.title: PhD researcher & teaching assistant

profile_positions.description:
•	Improved Electromigration theory
•	As a part of a team developed Heat transfer model
profile_positions.title: Visiting Researcher

volunteer_experiences.description: I coach and mentor colleagues on topics of Carrier choices, Conflict management and Work-life balance. A member of Shell Coach Pool.

Expedition "Conserving Leopards and Monkeys" in South Africa. The project integrates the field-work experience, including community engagement activities, with dedicated learning and reflection sessions to promote a broad-based understanding of sustainability and climate change.
